price: Sema: Hao wanao mzulia uwongo Mwenyezi Mungu hawatafanikiwa.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Waambie: Hao wanao mtungia Mwenyezi Mungu uwongo, na wanadai kuwa ana mwana, hawatafanikiwa milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
